import Preloader from '../../common/preloader' import s from './ProfileInfo.module.css' import React from 'react' import ProfileStatusWithHooks from './ProfileStatusF' const ProfileInfo = ({profile, status, updateStatus}) => { if (!profile) return return
} export default ProfileInfo
